title: E21 Four Pounds of Uneaten Bacon and A Deeply Holy-Some Blonde
description:
Take a trip with us down the extremely windy road of episode 21, in which Em compares Christine’s upcoming wedding to an axe murder and we also discover Em’s alter-ego is a wacky waving inflatable tube man.
Em and her gelatinous limbs tell us all about the Villisca Axe Murders, while Christine’s story about the still-at-large killer Robert William Fisher the turns into a sort of dark version of Sesame Street.
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
